text: Nicolas Lemaître (born 12 January 1997) is a French professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Stade de Reims of the French Ligue 1. ==Professional career== Lemaître made his professional debut for Reims in a 1–0 Ligue 2 loss to FC Sochaux-Montbéliard on 11 February 2017. Lemaître signed his first professional contract with Reims in June 2017. Lemaître helped Stade de Reims win the 2017–18 Ligue 2, helping promote them to the Ligue 1 for the 2018–19 season. ==Honours== Reims * Ligue 2 (1): 2017–18 ==References== ==External links== * * LFP Profile * Stade de Reims Profile Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Reims Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:French footballers Category:Stade de Reims players Category:Ligue 2 players
title: Nicolas Lemaître
